title: Craftsmen inherit local earthenware culture in Wanyao Village of Yunnan
content: A craftsman works at a pottery workshop in Wanyao Village of Mazhan Township in Tengchong, southwest China's Yunnan Province, Nov. 18, 2020. Wanyao is a village specializing in making pottery. The craftsmen in the village use unique local clay and follow traditional process making various pottery products of plain yet practical shapes as a way to inherit the local earthenware culture. (Photo by Liang Zhiqiang/Xinhua)
